Package org.linuxforhealth.fhir.database.utils.api

Interface IDatabaseTypeAdapter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CitusAdapter, CommonDatabaseAdapter, DerbyAdapter, PostgresAdapter
    public interface IDatabaseTypeAdapter
    Used to handle the syntax differences between databases for certain types like varbinary/varchar as bit data etc.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods
